titleStmt.title: Memoires of Henry, D. of Guise, relating his passage to Naples, and heading there the second revolt of the people, Englished
Mémoires. English
titleStmt.author: Guise, Henri, duc de, 1614-1664.
Sainctyon, Sieur de.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: The privilege is granted to "le sieur de Sainctyon, secretaire ... [du] défunt ... duc de Guise," to whom the work has been ascribed. Cf. Sources de l'hist. de France, XVIIe siécle (1610-1715) II, p. 95.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
